augmentation_techniques.quote: return Compose([ RandomResizedCrop(img_size, img_size), Transpose(p=0.5), HorizontalFlip(p=0.5), VerticalFlip(p=0.5), ShiftScaleRotate(p=0.5), Normalize(mean=[0.5, 0.5, 0.5], std=[0.5, 0.5, 0.5]), ToTensorV2(), ])

base_models.quote: My final submission is ensemble of three ViT models... vit_base_patch16_384... vit_base_patch16_224 - A... vit_base_patch16_224 - B

primary_loss.quote: self.criterion = CrossEntropyLoss().to(self.device) if not self.config.label_smooth else CrossEntropyLossWithLabelSmooth(epsilon=self.config.label_smooth_alpha).to(self.device)

learning_rate_schedule.quote: LR Scheduler: LambdaLR self.scheduler = LambdaLR(self.optimizer, lr_lambda=lambda epoch: 1.0 / (1.0 + epoch))

additional_layers.quote: vit_base_patch16_384's final layer is not multi-drop but simple linear... Multi-Dropout Linear

ensemble_method.quote: Weighted Averaging... they are adapted the weighted average using calculated weights at attention layer

libraries.quote: from albumentations import (Compose, Normalize, Resize, RandomResizedCrop, HorizontalFlip, VerticalFlip, ShiftScaleRotate, Transpose,)
